message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper focuses on emotion analysis from text, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). The paper specifically deals with the task of annotating news headlines with emotions, semantic roles, and reader perception, which can be applied to various NLP tasks such as emotion classification, intensity prediction, and cause detection. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and related tasks. Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), as these fields also deal with NLP and related tasks.
